title: How to Secure Your ROBLOX Account

steps.headline: Go to the "Account Settings" tab.
steps.description: This is the first step to setting up 2-Step Verification, which is a very important feature on Roblox, as it makes it practically impossible to log into your account from a new device without having access of your email.

steps.headline: Find "2 Step Verification" at the top.
steps.description: Click the switch, and 2-Step Verification will automatically be enabled. In order to enable it, however, you must have a verified email adress.

steps.headline: Proceed to playing Roblox again as usual.
steps.description: It will not affect your account except making you have a safer game experience.

steps.headline: Click the switch on "Enable Account Pin".
steps.description: If you have followed the steps correctly, it will show you a fragment of your verified email adress and a screen asking for you to enter a 4-digit account pin.

steps.headline: Go back to playing Roblox as normal.

text: Setting Up 2-Step Verification Go to the "Account Settings" tab. This is the first step to setting up 2-Step Verification, which is a very important feature on Roblox, as it makes it practically impossible to log into your account from a new device without having access of your email. Click "Security".  Find "2 Step Verification" at the top. Click the switch, and 2-Step Verification will automatically be enabled. In order to enable it, however, you must have a verified email adress. Proceed to playing Roblox again as usual. It will not affect your account except making you have a safer game experience. Enabling an Account Pin Click on "Account Settings".  Click "Security".  Click the switch on "Enable Account Pin". If you have followed the steps correctly, it will show you a fragment of your verified email adress and a screen asking for you to enter a 4-digit account pin. Confirm the 4 digit pin.  Go back to playing Roblox as normal. You will have to enter the pin to change certain settings, including your email and password.
